actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that order must be immediately restored to the cities of the United States so that citizens may have peace and the legitimate grievances of peaceful protestors may be heard and considered.
subjects: Urban and suburban affairs and development

summary.text: This resolution expresses the sense of the Senate that order must be restored to American cities so that citizens may have peace and the grievances of peaceful protestors may be heard and considered.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that order must be immediately restored to the cities of the United States so that citizens may have peace and the legitimate grievances of peaceful protestors may be heard and considered.
